Amber Davies is dreaming of the winter sun in her latest topless throwback snap.

The 9 to 5 the Musical star treated her fans to a semi-naked throwback pic as she counts down the days until her next getaway.

She appeared to be enjoying some sunshine in the beach selfie, and it seems she forgot to wear her bikini top which set pulses racing.

Amber, 23, gave a huge pout to the camera as she unveiled her sun-kissed glow, while her cleavage was on full display.

Her glowing skin was makeup free, showcasing her smooth natural skin and freckles.

With her head resting on one hand, the star had her eyes closed with no care in the world as she showed off the tropical background.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

"The countdown to winter sun begins..." she teased, suggesting a holiday is around the corner.

Her celebrity friends gave her a confidence boost on the post.

Former Towie girl Lauren Pope agreed that the star is a stunning natural, as she commented: "Super fresh," with a heart emoji.

(Image: amb_d/Instagram)

Celebrity brow stylist Salih 'The Eyebrow King' said: "Hello sexy! When are we getting married," signed off with a heart.

While Love Island's Dom Lever joked: "Need sun all year round".

Her racy post comes after a row with Geordie Shore's Chloe Ferry.

(Image: Nils Jorgensen/REX/Shutterstock)

Chloe begged Amber to 'stop lying' about sleeping with her ex-boyfriend Sam Gowland.

The upset Geordie Shore star claimed repeatedly that Amber has slept with Sam, which the Love Island winner has vehemently denied .

Amber took to Instagram and wrote: "This is the story. A couple of months ago the papers contacted Sam and I's management saying they were running a story that we had slept together. We hadn't. And both parties denied the allegations.

"A couple of weeks ago Sam replied to one of my Instagram stories and I ignored him after the whole drama. He then went on to message me saying he hoped the whole situation hadn't ruined our friendship because it was quite frankly ridiculous."
description: The 9 to 5 the Musical, 23, star treated her fans to a semi-naked throwback picture on Thursday
